è§£é¡Œæ€è·¯ï¼š

  • æ¯ 7 å€‹å–å®Œçš„ç“¶å­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å†å…Œæ›ä¸€ç“¶
  • drink ä»£è¡¨é‚„æ²’å–çš„ï¼Œbottle ä»£è¡¨å–å®Œçš„ç“¶å­
  • å…ˆæŠŠä¸€é–‹å§‹çš„é£²æ–™éƒ½å–å®Œ 
    int bottle = drink;
  • å¦‚æœä¸€é–‹å§‹çš„é£²æ–™å¤§æ–¼ç­‰æ–¼ 7 ç“¶ï¼Œå°±ç¹¼çºŒå…Œæ›ï¼ˆwhile è¿´åœˆï¼‰
  • æ¯å…Œæ›ä¸€æ¬¡å°±å–æ‰ 1 ç“¶ï¼Œå…Œæ› n æ¬¡å°±å–æ‰ n ç“¶
  • æŠŠä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡å–æ‰çš„ç“¶å­è·Ÿä¸è¶³å…Œæ›çš„ç“¶å­æ”¶é›†èµ·ä¾†ï¼Œå†æ‹¿å»å…Œæ›
  • æœ€å¾Œä¸å¤ å…Œæ›ï¼ˆç“¶å­< 7ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±çµæŸäº†ï¼ˆè·³å‡º while è¿´åœˆï¼‰
  • é€™æ™‚å€™çš„ bottle å°±æœƒæ˜¯å…¨éƒ¨å–å®Œçš„ç“¶å­
  • TCGS Judge é¡ä¼¼é¡Œç›®ï¼šTCGS a041ï¼šæ”¶é›†å†°æ£’æ£
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int drink;
    while(cin>>drink){
        int bottle = drink;
        while(drink >= 7){
            bottle += drink/7;
            drink = drink/7 + drink%7;
        }
        cout<<bottle<<endl;
    }
}

æœŸä¸­è€ƒç¬¬äºŒé¡Œï¼šææ¬¾å¡å¯†ç¢¼


è§£é¡Œæ€è·¯ï¼š

  • a b c d . . . ç…§é †åºæ’åºï¼Œè¨ˆç®—ä»–å€‘ç›¸é–“çš„è·é›¢
  • å°‡ä¸Šè¿°åšæ³•å…·ç¾åŒ–ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ ASCII
  • å°‡å…©å­—å…ƒçš„ ASCII ç›¸æ¸›ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä»–å€‘ä¹‹é–“çš„è·é›¢
  • å› ç‚ºå·®æœ‰å¯èƒ½ç‚ºè² ï¼Œä¸”è·é›¢ä¸ç‚ºè² ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åŠ ä¸Š <cmath> çš„ abs() çµ•å°å€¼

  • ASCII æ¬²åšé‹ç®—éœ€å°‡å®ƒè½‰å½¢æ…‹ï¼ˆcastï¼‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ int è½‰ç‚ºæ•´æ•¸å½¢æ…‹
  • for è¿´åœˆéæ­· word ä¸­æ¯ä¸€å€‹å­—å…ƒï¼Œä¸”ç´¢å¼• i èˆ‡ i+1 çš„å€¼
  • æ³¨æ„ä¸Šè¿°åšæ³• i æœƒè·‘åˆ° < length-1
  • ZeroJudge é¡ä¼¼é¡Œç›®ï¼šZerojudge a065ï¼šææ¬¾å¡å¯†ç¢¼

åƒè€ƒç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼š

#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string word;
    cin>>word;
    int length = word.size();
    for(int i=0;i<length-1;i++){
        cout<<int ( abs(word[i+1]-word[i]) ) % 10;
    }
    cout<<endl;
}

item.title: [C++] é€²åˆ¶è½‰æ›
item.description:
å¯èƒ½æ˜¯å› ç‚ºé«˜ä¸­èª²æ¥­ç¹å¿™å§ï¼Œç•¶åˆè¦ºå¾— STL å°æˆ‘ä¾†èªªå¤ªå¤šé¤˜äº†ï¼Œ
æ‰€ä»¥å°±æ²’èˆˆè¶£å­¸äº†ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ”¾æ‰äº†ã€‚
é€™æ¬¡é‡æ‹¾ STL ï¼Œå…ˆå¾ç°¡å–®çš„ vector ä¾†ç·´ç·´æ‰‹ï¼Œ
ä¸¦ç”¨é€²åˆ¶è½‰æ›ç•¶åšä¸»é¡Œï¼

â€» STL æ˜¯ Standrad Template Library çš„ç¸®å¯«

åé€²ä½è½‰äºŒé€²ä½ï¼š

  • ä»¥äºŒé€²ä½å®šç¾©è¨ˆç®—
  • ä¸¦å°‡æ¯æ¬¡çš„çµæœæ’å…¥ vector çš„èµ·é»ï¼ˆå¾Œé¢è§£é‡‹ç‚ºä»€éº¼æ˜¯ insert ï¼‰
  • å‚³å…¥ï¼šæ•´æ•¸ï¼ˆintï¼‰
  • å›å‚³ï¼šé™£åˆ—ï¼ˆvectorï¼‰
vector<int> baseBinary(int number){
    vector<int> result;
    vector<int>::iterator it;
    while(number>0){
        it = result.begin();
        if (number%2==0)
            result.insert(it,0);
        else
            result.insert(it,1);
        number /= 2;
    }

    return result;
}

å°å‡ºäºŒé€²ä½ï¼š

  • å› ç‚ºäºŒé€²ä½ç®—å®Œå¾Œï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯çµæœå¾€å‰æ¨ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ insert
  • é€™æ¨£ä¸€ä¾†é™£åˆ—éæ­·å°±å¾ begin å°±å¥½äº†
  • iterator æœ‰é»åƒæ˜¯ for vector çš„ æŒ‡æ¨™ ï¼Œæƒ³è¦çŸ¥é“å…¶ä¸­çš„å€¼è¦ å–å€¼ ï¼ˆ*ï¼‰
  • å‚³å…¥ï¼šé™£åˆ—ï¼ˆvectorï¼‰
  • å›å‚³ï¼šç„¡ï¼ˆvoidï¼‰
void print(vector<int> number){
    vector<int>::iterator it;
    for(it=number.begin();it!=number.end();it++)
        cout<<*it;
    cout<<endl;
}

äºŒé€²ä½è½‰åé€²ä½ï¼š

  • æ¯ä¸€ä½æ•¸å­—ä¹˜ä¸Šæƒ³å°æ‡‰çš„å€¼
  • å‚³å…¥ï¼šé™£åˆ—ï¼ˆvectorï¼‰
  • å›å‚³ï¼šæ•´æ•¸ï¼ˆintï¼‰
int baseDecimal(vector<int> number){
    int result = 0;
    int length = number.size();
    for(int i=0;i<length;i++){
        result += number[i] * baseTwo[length-i-1];
    }
    return result;
}

å®£å‘Šä»¥äºŒç‚ºåŸºåº•çš„æ¬¡æ–¹æ•¸å€¼ï¼š

  • å…¨åŸŸå®£å‘Šä»¥ä¾¿ function ä½¿ç”¨
vector<int> baseTwo = {1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096};

å®Œæ•´ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼š

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

vector<int> baseTwo = {1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096};
vector<int> baseBinary(int number);
int baseDecimal(vector<int> number);
void print(vector<int> number);

int main()
{
    int number;
    cin>>number;
    vector<int> result;
    result = baseBinary(number);
    print(result);
    cout<<baseDecimal(result);

}

vector<int> baseBinary(int number){
    vector<int> result;
    vector<int>::iterator it;
    while(number>0){
        it = result.begin();
        if (number%2==0)
            result.insert(it,0);
        else
            result.insert(it,1);
        number /= 2;
    }

    return result;
}

int baseDecimal(vector<int> number){
    int result = 0;
    int length = number.size();
    for(int i=0;i<length;i++){
        result += number[i] * baseTwo[length-i-1];
    }
    return result;
}

void print(vector<int> number){
    vector<int>::iterator it;
    for(it=number.begin();it!=number.end();it++)
        cout<<*it;
    cout<<endl;
}

ä¹‹å¾Œå†å°‡å…¶ä»–é€²åˆ¶è£œä¸Š

item.title: [Python] ä¼°è¨ˆåœ“å‘¨ç‡
item.description:
åˆ©ç”¨åœ“çš„å®šç¾©ä»¥åŠåœ“è·Ÿæ­£æ–¹å½¢çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œ
é€²è€Œæ¨ç®—å‡ºåœ“å‘¨ç‡ï¼

import random

times = 99999

circle = 0

for _ in range( times ) :
  x = random.uniform(0.0,1.0)
  y = random.uniform(0.0,1.0)
  distance = x**2 + y**2
  if distance < 1 :
    circle += 1

pi = 4 * circle / times
print(pi)

item.title: [Python] çŸ©é™£é‹ç®—
item.description:
å› ç‚º Linear Algebra çš„ sheng å“¥å‡ºé¡Œä¸æ‰‹è»Ÿï¼Œ
æ‰€ä»¥å°±æŠŠçŸ©é™£çš„å„ç¨®é‹ç®—éƒ½å¯«å¥½äº†ï¼
ä»¥å…ä¸Šæ©Ÿçš„æ™‚å€™è…¦è¢‹å¡ä½ . . .

è¡Œåˆ—å¼ï¼š

  • åˆ©ç”¨éè¿´å°‡é™£åˆ—ç¸®å°ï¼Œä¸¦ç®—å‡ºè¡Œåˆ—å¼å€¼
  • éè¿´çµ‚é»ç‚º length==2 ï¼ˆäºŒéšè¡Œåˆ—å¼å®šç¾©ï¼‰
  • è¨ˆç®—åŸç†æ˜¯ first row è¨ˆç®—
  • å›å‚³ï¼šæ•¸å­—ï¼ˆnumberï¼‰
def determinant(m) :
  length = len(m)
  if length > 2 :
    result = 0
    coe = []
    for i in range(length) :
      coe.append( (-1)**(i)*m[0][i] )
      matrix = []
      for j in range(1,length) :
        row = []
        for k in range(length) :
          if k != i :
            row.append(m[j][k])
        matrix.append(row)
      result += coe[i]*determinant(matrix)
    return result
  else :
    return m[0][0]*m[1][1]-m[1][0]*m[0][1]

è½‰ç½®çŸ©é™£ï¼š

  • å°±æ˜¯å€‹è½‰ç½®çŸ©é™£
  • æ³¨æ„é™£åˆ—å¤§å°æ˜¯ row , column äº’æ›
  • å›å‚³ï¼šäºŒç¶­é™£åˆ—ï¼ˆtwo-dimensional listï¼‰
def transpose(m) :
  row = len(m)
  col = len(m[0])
  matrix = []

  for i in range(col) :
    newRow = []
    for j in range(row) :
      newRow.append(m[j][i])
    matrix.append(newRow)

  return matrix

Minorï¼š

  • è¨ˆç®—é™£åˆ—ä¸­æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®çš„ minor
  • é™¤äº†å‚³å…¥é™£åˆ—ï¼Œé‚„è¦å‚³å…¥ä½ç½®
  • if newRow : åˆ¤æ–· newRow æ˜¯å¦ç‚ºç©ºé™£åˆ—
  • å›å‚³ï¼šäºŒç¶­é™£åˆ—ï¼ˆtwo-dimensional listï¼‰
def minor(m,row,col) :
  length = len(m)
  matrix = []

  for i in range(length) :
    newRow = []
    for j in range(length) :
      if i!=row and j!=col :
        newRow.append(m[i][j])
    if newRow :
      matrix.append(newRow)

  return matrix

Cofactorï¼š

  • é…åˆ Minor è·Ÿ determinant è¨ˆç®—å‡º Cofactor
  • å›å‚³ï¼šäºŒç¶­é™£åˆ—ï¼ˆtwo-dimensional listï¼‰
def cofactor(m) :
  length = len(m)
  matrix = []

  for i in range(length) :
    newRow = []
    for j in range(length) :
      newRow.append( (-1)**(i+j)*determinant(minor(m,i,j)) )
    matrix.append(newRow)

  return matrix

ä¼´éš¨çŸ©é™£ï¼š

  • åˆ©ç”¨ adjoint çš„å®šç¾©è¨ˆç®—
  • å…ˆå–é™£åˆ—çš„ cofactor å† transpose
  • å›å‚³ï¼šäºŒç¶­é™£åˆ—ï¼ˆtwo-dimensional listï¼‰
def adjoint(m) :
  matrix = cofactor(m)
  matrix = transpose(matrix)

  return matrix

åçŸ©é™£ï¼š

  • inverse è¨ˆç®—æœ‰å…©ç¨®
  • ä¸€ç¨®æ˜¯ row operationï¼Œå¦ä¸€ç¨®æ˜¯ adjoint è·Ÿ determinant çš„çµ„åˆï¼Œé€™è£¡ä½¿ç”¨å¾Œè€…
  • è¡Œåˆ—å¼å€¼ç‚ºé›¶æ˜¯æ²’è¢«å®šç¾©çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœƒå›å‚³éŒ¯èª¤
  • å›å‚³ï¼šå­—ä¸²ï¼ˆErrorï¼‰ OR äºŒç¶­é™£åˆ—ï¼ˆtwo-dimensional listï¼‰
def inverse(m) :
  length = len(m)
  det = determinant(m)
  if det == 0 :
    return "Error"
  matrix = adjoint(m)

  for i in range(length) :
    for j in range(length) :
      matrix[i][j] *= (1/det)

  return matrix


å®Œæ•´ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼š

def determinant(m) :
  length = len(m)
  if length > 2 :
    result = 0
    coe = []
    for i in range(length) :
      coe.append( (-1)**(i)*m[0][i] )
      matrix = []
      for j in range(1,length) :
        row = []
        for k in range(length) :
          if k != i :
            row.append(m[j][k])
        matrix.append(row)
      result += coe[i]*determinant(matrix)
    return result
  else :
    return m[0][0]*m[1][1]-m[1][0]*m[0][1]

def transpose(m) :
  row = len(m)
  col = len(m[0])
  matrix = []

  for i in range(col) :
    newRow = []
    for j in range(row) :
      newRow.append(m[j][i])
    matrix.append(newRow)

  return matrix

def minor(m,row,col) :
  length = len(m)
  matrix = []

  for i in range(length) :
    newRow = []
    for j in range(length) :
      if i!=row and j!=col :
        newRow.append(m[i][j])
    if newRow :
      matrix.append(newRow)

  return matrix

def cofactor(m) :
  length = len(m)
  matrix = []

  for i in range(length) :
    newRow = []
    for j in range(length) :
      newRow.append( (-1)**(i+j)*determinant(minor(m,i,j)) )
    matrix.append(newRow)

  return matrix

def adjoint(m) :
  matrix = cofactor(m)
  matrix = transpose(matrix)

  return matrix

def inverse(m) :
  length = len(m)
  det = determinant(m)
  if det == 0 :
    return "Error"
  matrix = adjoint(m)

  for i in range(length) :
    for j in range(length) :
      matrix[i][j] *= (1/det)

  return matrix

æ¸¬è©¦ï¼š

matrix = [
  [1,-1,0],
  [1,0,-1],
  [-6,2,3]
]


m = cofactor(matrix)
print(m)
m = adjoint(matrix)
print(m)
m = inverse(matrix)
print(m)

æ¸¬è©¦å·¥å…·ï¼š

  • é™£åˆ—ç”¢ç”Ÿå™¨
  • çŸ©é™£è¨ˆç®—æ©Ÿ

item.title: [C++] NCYU å›å®¶åŠŸèª²11
item.description:
è«‹ä¸è¦ç›´æ¥æŠ„å¯«ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼
ä¹Ÿè«‹ä¸è¦ç›´æ¥è·³åˆ°ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œé™¤éä½ å·²ç¶“å¯«å¥½äº†ï¼Œæƒ³è¦åƒè€ƒåˆ¥äººçš„å¯«æ³•ï¼

å›å®¶åŠŸèª²11

  • while æ˜¯è¿´åœˆçš„ä¸€ç¨®ï¼Œåªè¦æ¢ä»¶æˆç«‹ï¼ˆtureï¼‰ï¼Œå°±ç¹¼çºŒåŸ·è¡Œ
  • å› ç‚º 1 åœ¨ç¨‹å¼è£¡å¯ä»¥ä»£è¡¨ true ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ while(1) or while(true) å°±æœƒæ˜¯ç„¡çª®è¿´åœˆï¼Œé€šå¸¸æ­é… break ä¾†è·³è„«è¿´åœˆ

number++; // number = number +1;
cout<<number;
// è¼¸å‡ºçµæœæœƒæ˜¯äº‚æ•¸ï¼Œå› ç‚ºé›»è…¦ä¸çŸ¥é“ number æ˜¯å¤šå°‘
  • åˆ¤æ–·å¥‡å¶æ•¸ä¹‹å‰æ•™éå›‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åƒè€ƒ èª²å ‚ç·´ç¿’02

ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¤§æ¦‚å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

#include <iostream>  
using namespace std;  
int main()  
{  
    while(1){  
        int n;  
        cin>>n;  
        if ( n == -1 )  
            break;  

        int counter = 0;  
        while(1){  
            if ( n%2==0 ){  
                counter++;  
                n /= 2;  
            }  
            else  
                break;  
        }  
        cout<<counter<<endl;  
    }  
}

å›å®¶åŠŸèª²09

  • å…ˆè§€å¯Ÿåœ–å½¢ï¼š
    • è¼¸å…¥ 3 å°±æœƒæœ‰ 3 è¡Œ 3 åˆ—ã€è¼¸å…¥ 5 å°±æœƒæœ‰ 5 è¡Œ 5 åˆ—ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¼¸å…¥ n å°±æœƒæœ‰ n è¡Œ n åˆ—
    • ç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—çš„ o åœ¨æœ€ä¸­é–“ã€ç¬¬ n åˆ—çš„ o å¾ä¸­é–“å¾€å…©é‚Šå¢åŠ ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æœ€ä¸­é–“é‚£åˆ—å…¨ç‚º o ï¼ˆæœ€ä¸­é–“æ€éº½ç”¨ n è¡¨ç¤ºå‘¢ï¼Ÿï¼‰
    • ä¸æ˜¯ x çš„åœ°æ–¹å°±æ˜¯ o
    • o çš„è®ŠåŒ–å¾ˆåƒ æ“´æ•£ ï¼Œæ¯å¤šä¸€è¡Œ o å°±å¾€å…©é‚Šæ“´æ•£ä¸€å€‹ï¼Œç¶“éä¸­é–“é‚£åˆ—ä¹‹å¾Œï¼Œå°±é–‹å§‹ ç¸®æ¸›
    • è¦æ³¨æ„æ˜¯å°å¯« xo ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼

ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¤§æ¦‚å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

#include <iostream>  
using namespace std;  
int main()  
{  
    int n;  
    cin>>n;  
    int center = n/2+1;  
    int offset = 0;  
    for(int row=1;row<=n;row++){  
        for(int col=1;col<=n;col++){  
            if ( col>center+offset || col<center-offset )  
                cout<<"x";  
            else  
                cout<<"o";  
        }  
        if ( row<center )  
            offset++;  
        else  
            offset--;  

        cout<<endl;  
    }  
}

{

        cout<<"1";

}

ç¬¬äºŒé¡Œ

  • å…ˆæ‹†è§£é¡Œç›®ï¼Œåˆ†æˆéšå±¤è·Ÿå–é¤˜æ•¸
  • éšå±¤å®šç¾©ç‚º 0! = 1, n! = 1 x 2 x ... x n

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>0){
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        int result = 1;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
            result *= i%m;
            result %= m;
        }
        cout<<result%m<<endl;
        t--;
    }
}

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    for(int row=1;row<=n;row++){
        int number = row*2;
        cout<<number;
        for(int col=2;col<=row;col++){
            cout<<" "<<number + (col-1)*2;
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
}

    #include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  string word;
  getline(cin,word);

  // a 97 z 122 A 65 Z 90
  for(unsigned int i=0;i<word.size();i++){
      if ( 97<=word.at(i) && word.at(i)<=122 )
          word.at(i) -= 32;
  }
  cout<<word;
}
